channel.title: Complete Kits – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: VooPoo Drag Nano Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: WOW-GREAT PRICE! The Gene POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!
item.content:encoded:
VooPoo’s first pod system is a huge brake through… In a tiny package!

The Drag Nano Pod Kit is born, VooPoo’s tiny pod system is just 44g! the lightweight and portable pod kit is enjoyable anytime and anywhere! The Drag Nano’s intelligent cold boot mode is for an extreme flavor experience immediately on the first puff. The intelligent power output balance is fantastic for e-Liquid flavors as always. The Drag Nano’s 750mAh battery capacity can power about 350 puffs and can be charged in about an hour! Along for the ride is the new Gene.POD Chip adjusted more than 40 times with more than 200 flavor testers involved.

The Gene.POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!

Kit Features: 

  • Dimension: 54.5*35*11mm
  • Battery: On-Board 750mAh
  • Material: Zinc Alloy & Aluminum Alloy
  • Weight: 44G
  • Voltage Output: 3.2-4.2V
  • Charge Voltage: 5V/0.5A
  • Quiescent Current: <15uA
  • Pod Capacity: 1ml
  • Resistance: 1.8ohms
  • Material: PCTG
  • Size: 36.3*15*7.0mm

Package Contents:

  • 1x Drag Nano
  • 1x Nano Pod
  • 1x USB Cable
  • 1x Warranty Card
  • 1x GENE CHIP Card

item.title: JoyeTech Batpack Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: The Batpack is the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power!
item.content:encoded:
The Joyetech BatPack Starter Kit with batteries is completely authentic in power, brand and performance! The Joyetech BatPack comes equipped with the Joyetech Eco D16 Tank, two batteries and it delivers exclusivity in every sense of the word!

The distinctness behind the Batpack is that it is a very small vaporizer that literally fits in the palm of your hand…comfortably! (Imagine that?) This completely portable device makes vaping convenient and hassle-free every single time. The Batpack is recognized as the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power. When you use fully charged rechargeable batteries (2000mAh), it gets you more puffs than the normal AA batteries while you’re vaping…(try 800 puffs)!

The Batpack also uses ECO technology to provide incredible vaping experiences while allowing the battery to have a very low output. The ECO technology doubles the battery life and extends the amount of time you vape before having to recharge the batteries. This is in part because of the Joyetech ECO D16 Tank which has a 2ml capacity and an anti-leak structure, so leaks become non-existent. Filling e-juice can be done directly and conveniently. Dripping a few drops of e-Lliquid to the atomizer head, avoids dry burns while you’re vaping. Not to be outdone, the ECO D16 works with the included BFHN 0.5ohm MTL coil head.

Kit Features:

  • Size:112.5 x 37.00 x 18.0mm (Including Tank)
  • Weight: 88.0g
  • Simple One Button Design
  • 1.85V Constant Output
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 2.0mL
  • Top Fill Design with Twist Off Cap
  • Dual Restrictive Airflow Hole Design
  • Lightweight and Compact Design
  • Optimized for Higher Nicotine Levels

Package Contents:

  • 1x Batpack Mod
  • 1x Joyetech ECO D16 Tank
  • 2x AA batteries
  • 2x BFHN 0.5ohm Head (MTL)
  • 1x Set of Spare Parts
  • 1x Micro USB Cable

item.title: iJoy Avenger PD270 Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Voice control to bring you the first "AI" Vape Mod!
item.content:encoded:
iJoy is changing the concept of what the future of vaping looks like with the new Avenger 270. The Avenger Mod uses the latest technological advancement, voice control to bring you the first “AI” Vape Mod!

The Avenger 270 is a unique “one-of-a-kind” vape platform designed to free the hands by employing voice control functions that include: wattage up/down, lock device, light color, music color, and so on.

Paired with the Avenger 270 Mod is the new iJoy Avenger Sub-Ohm Tank, a high performance cloud chasing tank featuring the iJoy X3 family coil heads and the new innovative pre-made MESH coils.

Product Features:

  • Voice control
  • Max Wattage: 234W
  • Compact and portable
  • Bright and big size screen
  • No overhang with 30mm tanks
  • Dual 20700 batteries Box Mod (batteries included)
  • 18650 battery fit with adapter
  • Personalized design, with a unique experience
  • NI/TI/SS temperature control
  • TCR function
  • Unique Custom User Mode
  • Resistance Range: 0.05~3.0 ohm
  • USB port charging support
  • Firmware Upgradeable

Product Includes:

  • 1 x iJoy Avenger PD270 Box Mod
  • 2 x 20700 Batteries
  • 1 x 18650 Adapter
  • 1 x Avenger Sub-Ohm
  • 1 x X3-MESH Coil (mesh coil, wood pulp + cotton, 0.15 ohm, 40-90W pre-installed)
  • 1 x X3-C1S Coil (wood pulp + cotton, 0.35 ohm, 40-80W)
  • 1 x Replacement Glass
  • 1 x Tool Pack
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card

item.title: Vaptio Ironclad Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
*SMOK BABY BEAST COMPATIBLE*

IronClad Frogman C Tank Kit by VAPTIO

IronClad, a compact and trendy shaped kit from Vaptio, has an all-in-one button for easy switch on/off and vaping. Combining a built-in 2600mAh built-in battery and a huge 6mL capacity tank, it offers longer vaping enjoyment and massive clouds. Mesh/Strip Coils are available for various tastes. Creative LED RBG lights clearly show the battery’s state of charge. Its leak-proof electrode frees you from risks of short-circuit and liquid leak. This is the IronClad, the symbol of simplest and purest vaping.

Specifications:

  • Tank Size: 24.5mm x 52mm
  • Tank Capacity: 6.0mL
  • Resistance Range: 0.2 Ohms
  • Frogman M1 Coil (0.2 ohm, DL, Mesh)
  • Frogman T1 Coil (0.2 ohms, DL, Strip)
  • Mod Size: 45mm x 26mm x 79mm
  • Battery Capacity: 2600mAh
  • Output Power: 50W (max)
  • Output Voltage: 2.8-4.2V (max)
  • Output Current: 25A (max)

PROTECTION – Everyone needs protection, let us protect you.

  • over-vaping, short circuit, low voltage, and over-heat protection

ALL-IN-ONE BUTTON, LED INDICATOR – Easy switch on/off and vaping with an all-in-one button. LED RBG lights indicate the state of the charge. Blue light indicates that there is 70%~100% battery life remaining, a Green light indicates that there is 30%~69% battery life remaining, and then a Red light indicates the device has a low battery life with only 1%~29% remaining.

PATENTED ANTI-LEAK TECHNOLOGY – Newly patented anti-leak design protects your mod circuitry from the rare occasional times your tank may leak.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x IronClad Mod
  • 1 x Frogman C Tank (SMOK Baby Beast Coil Compatible)
  • 1 x Frogman M1 0.2 Ohm Mesh Coil (pre-installed)
  • 1 x Frogman T1 0.2 Ohm Strip Coil
  • 2 x User Manuals
  • Spare Parts

item.title: iJoy Diamond VPC Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Great as a device all on its own! Pod adapter compatible with cartridges by JUUL, MYLE, JUNO, OVNS and more.
item.content:encoded:
*JUUL, MYLE, JUNO, OVNS & JC01 POD COMPATIBLE*

The Diamond VPC Kit is a super innovative compact vapor starter kit powered with 1400mAh internal 20350 battery. Featuring a diamond cutting appearance, multi-color options, and diamond fire button, Diamond VPC mod has a fast fire speed and maximum wattage of 45 Watts. The mod utilizes large OLED screen and features vape mode and pod mode allowing for the perfect temperature for compatible pods. The Diamond VPC Kit is completed with the UNIPOD tank, featuring a ceramic heating element and quick side filling slot for easy maintenance on the go.

The Diamond VPC Kit

Features:

  • 1400 mAh Internal Battery
  • Maximum Wattage: 45 Watts
  • Resistance Range: 0.03 – 3.0 Ohm
  • Pod Mode for compatible pods
  • Colorful OLED Screen
  • Multiple Protections
  • Micro USB Charging

IJOY  VPC Unipod Features:

  • Innovative Pod Atomizer Adapter
  • Diameter: 19mm
  • Juice Capacity: 2mL
  • Ceramic Coil
  • Coil Resistance: 1.0 ohm
  • Rated for 10-15W
  • Side-Fill Design
  • Slim Drip Tip for MTL Usage
  • 510 Connection

Includes:

  • 1x Diamond VPC 45W Box Mod
  • 1x Unipod VPC Atomizer Tank
  • 1x VPC Unipod
  • 1x Micro USB Cable
  • 1x User Manual

item.title: VooPoo Caliber Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
CALIBER is a powerful pen-style kit from VOOPOO with a built-in 3000mAh battery and UFORCE Tank. CALIBER’s design follows VOOPOO’s rule of minimalism and ergonomics. Functionality wise, CALIBER carries a 110W output to realize the best flavor with its portable design. Combined with the UFORCE tank, this kit shows the harmony between cloud and flavor.

Mod Specifications:

  • Power Range: 110W MAX
  • Battery Capacity: 3000mAh internal
  • Input Voltage: 3.2-4.2V
  • Output Voltage: 0-4.2V
  • Resistance Range: 0.15-3.0 Ohms
  • Temperature Range: 70 C
  • Weight: 108(+-2)g
  • Material: Stainless Steel 304

Tank & Coil Specifications:

  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Weight: 54.6g
  • Capacity: 5mL
  • Coil: Quadruple
  • Coil Head Resistance: 0.23 Ohm
  • Coil Head Wattage: 50-120W
  • Best Wattage for Coil Head: 60-80W
  • 510 Connector

DELICATE PATTERNS – Gold plating badge button and arrow lights makes the device more than just a metal stick; gold, gunmetal, rainbow knurl and star lines patterns… it is the details that make all the difference!

CLOUD MACHINE – With an output of 110W, CALIBER is a cloud maker as well as a flavor magician.

REAL 3000MAH CAPACITY – 23600 high-capacity battery empowers CALIBER with a strong and durable life. 60 more puffs than other similar products (over 200 puffs in total).

GENE.FAN CHIP INSIDE – 32-digit advanced GENE.FAN chip supports a no-delay 10ms firing speed.

FLAVOR-ORIENTED UFORCE TANK – Three adjustable air vents allow vapers to customize their favorite flavors. The precise structure and craftsmanship guarantee even air in from 3 flows, bringing smooth flavor to vapors.

E-LIQUID FILLING STEPS: It can effectively prevent e-juice leakage by pushing the top cap and filling in e-liquid, which is more convenient and clean.

  1. Hold the atomizer with your left hand, push the top cap with your right hand, and move it counterclockwise gently.
  2. Add e-liquid through the slot, paying attention to how much oil is filled in the tank (suggest no lower than the MIN line).
  3. Gently push back the top cap, then let the atomizer stand for 5 minutes to get the organic cotton completely saturated. 

ANTI-SCALD TANK DESIGN – Our engineers did numerous calculations for UFORCE tank, only to find the best structure in letting in the air and shortening the distance to evacuate the heat. Therefore, vapers can enjoy big clouds without over-heating.

POWERFUL UFORCE COIL – Rapid heating UFORCE coil will keep the original taste of e-liquids. UFORCE U4 is built for flavor, while U6 is for greater power and bigger clouds.

LARGE CAPACITY – Newly designed bubble glass tube could carry more e-liquid of 5mL to ensure your long lasting vape capacity.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x CALIBER Mod
  • 1 x UFORCE Tank
  • 1 x UFORCE U4 Coil
  • 1 x UFORCE U6 Coil
  • 1 x Spare Glass 3.5mL Tube
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 2 x User Manuals
  • 1 x Warranty Card
  • 1 x GENE.Chip Card

item.title: Smok Stick Prince Baby Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK Stick Prince Baby Starter Kit takes on a whole new meaning of being amazing! This kit is 100% authentic in power, brand and performance! The Smoktech Stick Prince Baby Starter Kit is comprised of the SMOK Stick Prince Baby 2000mAh Battery and the SMOK TFV12 Prince Baby Sub-Ohm Tank. Together, you’ll get one device that’s technologically advanced and equipped for your vaping needs.

For starters, the SMOK Stick Prince Baby 2000mAh is occupied with a mechanical-style output. It also assists in giving power to the LED light indicator that indicates the battery life and provides the status of the voltage when it’s below 3.3V. The Stick Prince Baby 2000mAh comes in a newly designed battery base and makes room for the power button of the device.

The TFV12 Prince Baby Sub-Ohm Tank has a multitude of features! For starters, this tank has a maximum tank capacity of 4.5ml for your e-Liquid and occupies a fill system with a single fill port that makes filling mess-free and easy. The airflow for the TFV12 Prince Baby is designed around the base of the device and provides an immense amount of airflow. The tank includes the V8 Baby M2 0.25 ohm coils which are designed for the mechanical style output of the tank, and the V8 Baby Mesh 0.15 ohm coil is included to provide fast and efficient heating.

Kit Features:
Stick Prince Baby Battery

  • 2000mAh Integrated Battery
  • Micro USB Charge Port
  • 5V 0.8A Maximum Charging Port
  • Smart Mechanical Style Output – Output Dependent on Current State of Battery
  • Full Safety and Protection Suite
  • 8 Second/Low Resistance/Short Circuit/Low Voltage
  • Intelligent LED Light Indicator
  • Carved Battery Base
  • Durable Alloy Construction
  • Indicates Battery Life Lights Up Around Hexagonal Firing Button Flash 4x Each Puff
  • Flash 15x Voltage Below 3.3V
  • Stainless Steel 510 Thread Point
  • Product Dimensions: 24.5mm x 85mm
  • 24K Gold Plated Spring Loaded Connection

TFV12 Baby Prince Sub- Ohm Tank:

  • 23mm Diameter Base
  • 26mm at Widest Point
  • Hinge and Lock Top Fill System 2mL Max Standard Capacity4.5mL Max Convex Glass Extension Capacity
  • Swivels Open and Shut
  • Fill Port
  • SMOK V8 Baby Coil Family
  • Dual Adjustable Air slots
  • Material: Stainless Steel and Glass Construction
  • V8 Baby M2 Coil Head
  • 0.25 ohm Coil
  • Dual Coil
  • V8 Baby Mesh Coil Head
  • Compatible with Additional V8 Baby Coils

Package Contents:

  • 1 x SMOK Stick Prince Baby 2000mAh Battery
  • 1 x SMOK TFV12 Baby Prince Sub-Ohm Tank
  • 1 x V8 Baby Mesh 0.15 ohm Coil Head (Pre-Installed)
  • 1 x V8 Prince-M2 0.25 ohm Coil Head
  • 1 x USB Charging Cable
  • 1 x Replacement and Spare Parts
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: Suorin Drop Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: The Suorin Drop features no buttons and automatically activates when you inhale.
item.content:encoded:
The Suorin Drop is exclusive because it’s extremely portable and makes carrying it around with you a cinch.

For starters, the Suorin Drop is occupied with a distinct unique water drop design which adds to the extremely light and dense body made from zinc alloy. The Suorin Drop features no buttons and automatically activates when you inhale. This is in part due to the built-in 310mAh battery which can be recharged using the micro USB charging port located on the bottom of the device.

Not to be outdone, the Suorin Drop uses a 2.0ml refillable cartridge system which allows for a couple hours of vaping before having to refill.

**Note: The Suorin Drop is NOT compatible with the original Suorin Air cartridges.

Kit Features:

  • Dimensions: 2-13/16″ x 1-15/16″ x 1/4″ (Including Cartridge)
  • Classic Automatic Style
  • Refillable Pod/Cartridge System
  • All-in-One Device
  • Capacity: 2.0ml
  • Built-in Battery Capacity: 310mAh
  • Maximum Wattage: 13W
  • Hidden Battery Life LED Indicator Light
  • Zinc Alloy Construction
  • Water Drop Design
  • Lightweight and Compact Design
  • Optimized for 70% VG / 30% PG E-Liquid
  • Utilizes Suorin Drop Refillable Cartridges – 1.3ohm ~ 1.4ohm
  • Micro USB Charging Port

Package Contents:

  • 1x Suorin Drop Device
  • 1x Sourin Drop Pod
  • 1x Warning Card
  • 1x Quality Certification
  • 1x Micro USB Cable
  • 1x User Manual

item.title: Vaporesso Drizzle Fit Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: OMNI Board MINI automatically detects the coil’s resistance to detect which style of vaping you want!
item.content:encoded:
DRIZZLE FIT is the perfect on the go device for MTL great for DTL. Using the brain of OMNI Board MINI it automatically detects the coil’s resistance to detect which style of vaping you want! For MTL it comes with 3 power modes designed to give you the power of choice. With the Drizzle Tank, you can fill e-juice in a convenient way from the top and avoid leakages. The adjustable top airflow on top allows you to control how restricted your flow is and further reduce any mess.

FEATURES:

  • 3 Power Modes for MTL
  • Top Fill Top Airflow
  • Drizzle Tank included
  • Tank Capacity 1.8ml
  • Power Range <40W
  • Built-in Battery 1400mAh
  • Resistance Range 0.3-1Ω
  • Modes MTL/DTL
  • Tank Drizzle Tank

INCLUDED:

  • 1 × Drizzle Fit Mod With Drizzle Tank (1.8ml)
  • 1 × EUC Mini CCELL Coil (1.3Ω)
  • 1 × EUC Mini Traditional Coil (1.4Ω)
  • 1 × Replacement Glass Tube (1.8ml)
  • O-Ring
  • USB cable
  • User Guide
  • Warranty Card

item.title: Smok Vape Pen 22 Light Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: LED lights at the tank base illuminate the tank and liquid! Compatible with Vape Pen 22 Coils.
item.content:encoded:
Vape Pen 22 Light Edition is an advanced version of Vape Pen 22, as the name implies, this new version has LED lights at the tank base. When you fire the device to vape, the LED will light up and change its color along with the color of sealing ring. It is an one-piece vaporizer in the compact size and simplest design. With a diameter of 22mm and 1650mAh battery capacity, the well-designed device will provide you massive cloud and unique flavor. What’s more, all parts of the Vape Pen 22 Light Edition can be detached and reassembled, bringing much more convenience in cleaning and maintenance. Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

Specifications:

  • Size: 110mm x 26mm
  • Weight: 90g
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Battery Capacity: 1650mAh
  • Thread: 510
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 4mL
  • Input Voltage: 3.3-4.2V
  • Resistance Range: 0.1 ohm – 2.5 ohm

DETACHABLE STRUCTURE FOR CONVENIENCE – All parts of the Vape Pen 22 Light Edition can be detached and reassembled, bringing much more convenience in cleaning and maintenance.

BUILT-IN 1650MAH BATTERY – With a built-in 1650mAh battery capacity and safety output, Vape Pen 22 Light Edition can be charged via the Micro-USB port easily and allows you to enjoy vaping freely.

INTELLIGENT LED INDICATOR – Vape Pen 22 Light Edition has LED indicator to tell you the accurate conditions of itself, for example, the LED indicator (white light) will turn on when holding and pressing the fire key to vape, and will flash 15 times when the voltage is lower than 3.3V. Meanwhile, the LED at the tank base will also light up, whose flash frequency is synchronized with the LED indicator.

VAPE PEN MESH COIL – Compared with traditional coil, Vape Pen Mesh core has a wide heating area, which can heat evenly and absorb e-liquid effectively, and it ensures you preferable flavor and huge vapor. What’s more, the mesh coil has a longer life span.

VAPE PEN STRIP COIL – Strip coil is a fire-new revolutionary coil from SMOK, which is made of Kanthal. It has larger heating area and radiation area, making the heating more evenly and helping the e-juice to heat up quickly. Besides, it can avoid the heat accumulation and the corrosion of heating materials. Compared with other traditional heating wires, strip coil can easily load higher power. On the combined effects of surface tension and van Edward force, it will activate numerous aromatic compounds in the e-juice to achieve both large cloud and dense flavor, bringing an unprecedented vaping experience.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Vape Pen 22 Light Edition
  • 1 x Vape Pen Mesh 0.15 Ohm Coil (pre-installed)
  • 1 x Vape Pen Strip 0.15 Ohm Coil
  • 7 x pairs of color sealing o-rings
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manul
  • Spare Parts
